content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Max. Based on our discussion, I believe we can come to an agreement on a rental price that will be mutually beneficial. However, I would like to clarify a few things before we proceed. May I ask what your budget is for renting this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 900 Euro per month. I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Understood, Max. Based on the apartment's size and location, I believe we can come to an agreement on a rental price that will be within your budget. However, as a landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains, so I would need to see your budget to determine the lowest price we can agree on.

May I ask what your budget is for renting this apartment, Max?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
